ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: Computer Specs for Bards CPU:  P2 400 (soon to be upgraded hopefully) RAM: 256MB Video Card (and RAM): as of yesterday, V5 5500 64MB Video Resolution: 640X480
ygData.messageBody:
Computer Specs for Bards

CPU: P2 400 (soon to be upgraded hopefully)
RAM: 256MB
Video Card (and RAM): as of yesterday, V5 5500 64MB
Video Resolution: 640X480 haven't tried anything higher, but will now with
the new card
Sound Card: Monster MX300 (ps I heard Guillemont was buying Aureal, so we
may get new drivers after all)
HD speed (rpm): 5400 grrr
'Net speed: 56k grrr (I'm a half mile outside of dsl range and there is no
cable modem provider here)
Geographic Location: 40 miles north of Houston, TX - Conroe to be precise
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: Double layer
Particle Effects: off
Mip Mapping: off, may try on again now though
Clip plane distance: 3/4's or so

How many songs can you twist? 3 on a good day
Do you slow down when it rains? no
How about in Unrest or Kunark? oh yeah, not sure now though

Weiland
35 bard of E. Marr
